name: Claire in the Forest
description:
Claire is shipwrecked off the coast of a strange but beautiful island, help her discover what has happned here. Explore this early access Demo today.

This game is currently under development and i would like your feedback and support to help me finish this project, meanwhlie enjoy this fully playable Game demo today.

Some of the screenshots reflect the latest build not included in the Demo.

Please report bugs or issues!

New in alpha 1.8 ----21 March 21

navigation- compass and Mini Map

new location Mysterious Statue.

more AI

save system refined

new UI for building.

new Starting area

New in alpha1.7 ----17 march 21

Build system -simple free base building included

UI toggle on/off

game sounds added, spawn changed on entry -surprise awaits.

more hidden locations for drops.

Save system added F1 to Save

New in 1.6

Updated UI
added new location Abandoned Sea Port

more AI - animals in game now

new in 1.5

added easy installer

added Inventory

added pick ups

added AI enemys

Many Bug fixes
New in 1.4

in this release added birds fully animated and driven by AI

dynamic weather and day night cycle, beautiful 3d environment to explore.

new location "Bear Cave"

remaped rocks and trees new water

swimming added- Claire can swim !

simple melee combat

Have fun exploring all and leave me some feedback and share this news!

Controls
F1 to Save

I = Inventory toggle off toggle on

L = dance

Tab Lock on enemy

WSAD move

Move camera with mouse

space jump

shift Run

Q roll dodge

B Hide GUI

scroll mouse change build options

Esc to go to menu or Quit.
